head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KRAMER, MILDRED F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KRAMER, MILDRED F.

block.p: KRAMER--Mildred F., age 91, beloved wife of the late Dr. Aaron Kramer, devoted mother of Dr. Rosanne and Dr. Elliot J. Silberman, Sydelle and Marc Sandler, Joyce and Alan Sternstein; cherished grandmother of Michelle and Dr. Clark Hubbard, Dr. Marc and Amy Silberman, Michael Sandler, Elisa and Andrew Share, Aliya and Rachel Sternstein; adoring great-grandmother of Rebecca and Jaclyn Silberman; loving sister of Harold I. and Patricia Fischer and Robert E. and Arlene Fischer. Services will be held on Tuesday, March 13, 11 am at Temple Neve Shalom, 250 Grove Avenue, Metuchen, NJ.

KRAMER--Mildred F., age 91, beloved wife of the late Dr. Aaron Kramer, devoted mother of Dr. Rosanne and Dr. Elliot J. Silberman, Sydelle and Marc Sandler, Joyce and Alan Sternstein; cherished grandmother of Michelle and Dr. Clark Hubbard, Dr. Marc and Amy Silberman, Michael Sandler, Elisa and Andrew Share, Aliya and Rachel Sternstein; adoring great-grandmother of Rebecca and Jaclyn Silberman; loving sister of Harold I. and Patricia Fischer and Robert E. and Arlene Fischer. Services will be held on Tuesday, March 13, 11 am at Temple Neve Shalom, 250 Grove Avenue, Metuchen, NJ.
